title: Pagination Component
description: A pagination component that allows users to navigate through pages of content

showFirstLast.description: Whether to show first and last page links

showPrevNext.description: Whether to show previous and next buttons

siblingCount.description: Number of sibling pages to show on each side of current page

boundaryCount.description: Number of boundary pages to show at start and end

onPageChange.description: Action ID for page change handler

itemsPerPage.description: Number of items per page (for display purposes)

totalItems.description: Total number of items being paginated

showPageInfo.description: Whether to show page info text

ariaLabel.description: ARIA label for the pagination navigation
